mapper.sql: ORG_PERSON_ID, ORG_ID, PERSONNEL_ID, POST_ID, REF_TYPE, PROPERTY, DOUBLE_NAME, SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE,ORG_TREE_ID
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NAME POSTNAME FROM TB_POST A WHERE A.POST_ID=#{postId} AND A.STATUS_CD='1000'
SELECT CTA.CONTENT FROM TB_CONTACT CTA WHERE CTA.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND CTA.FIRST_FLAG = 1 AND CTA.CONTACT_TYPE = 1 AND CTA.PERSONNEL_ID = #{personnelId} AND ROWNUM = 1
SELECT A.CERT_NO FROM TB_CERT A WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.CERT_TYPE=1 AND A.PERSONNEL_ID= #{personnelId} AND ROWNUM = 1
